content.en: SAR image segmentation: Researchers have explored various algorithms to improve the segmentation of Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) images. These algorithms, such as statistical region growing, spectral clustering, fuzzy c-means clustering, and non-local fuzzy clustering, aim to effectively and robustly segment SAR images by handling speckle noise, preserving edge details, and utilizing spatial texture information. Additionally, other algorithms, like superpixel generation and unsupervised classification, have been developed to enhance the speed and accuracy of SAR image segmentation.
content.da: SAR-billedesegmentering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre segmenteringen af Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) billeder. Disse algoritmer, som statistisk region voksende, spektral klyngeanalyse, fuzzy c-means klyngeanalyse og ikke-lokal fuzzy klyngeanalyse, sigter mod effektivt og robust at segmentere SAR-billeder ved at håndtere speckle-støj, bevare kantdetaljer og udnytte rumlig teksturinformation. Derudover er andre algoritmer, som superpixel-generering og usuperviseret klassifikation, blevet udviklet for at forbedre hastigheden og nøjagtigheden af SAR-billedesegmentering.
